ygData.subject: Re: Large Ruby
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen the Pirahna in RV lake and can kill them easily (at level 13 blues) one at a time but I have seen swarms of them 3 and 4 at a time. And I have seen
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen the Pirahna in RV lake and can kill them easily (at level 13
blues) one at a time but I have seen swarms of them 3 and 4 at a time. And I
have seen dead bodies on the bottom of the lake of players who I knew were
higher than me. I have yet to see the named one...

Also, was told that this ruby is not a gem stone ruby but one only useful
for the RV quest.

Snyak
Warrior of the 13th Level
Qeynos, Antonica 53226 visiting Freeport
Innoruuk
"The opinions expressed herein are my own and do not
necessarily reflect those of my Guild Master nor my Deity."


-----Original Message-----
From: Zwanenburg, John [mailto:ZWANENJ@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:59 PM
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Large Ruby

From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>

Hrm,

Thats odd. Crappy too. I feel like emailing the guys over at
EQ'lizer and
asking them where the heck they got the ruby from in
innothule swamp.

The only mob that i have heard of that drops a ruby is the
fish called
Chomper or something of the like in the rivervale lake.
Someone posted that
a few weeks ago on this list. Im not sure how hard of a mob
he is but i can
imagine killing a fish isnt too too easy. Especially one
that drops rubies.

Anyway if someone finds out what drops this ruby in
Innothule be sure to let
me know.

Thanks

John
